none.description:
{Shield}

Shields a selected unit, reducing the amount of damage received from hand-to-hand attacks.

basic.description:
{Basic Shield}

Shields a selected unit, reducing the amount of damage received from hand-to-hand attacks.

none.description:
{Air Shield}

Shields a selected unit, reducing the amount of damage received from ranged attacks.

basic.description:
{Basic Air Shield}

Shields a selected unit, reducing the amount of damage received from ranged attacks.

none.description:
{Fire Shield}

Cast on a friendly unit, it does not provide any additional protection, but any enemy attacking through the fire shield will suffer damage equal to a portion of what it inflicts.

basic.description:
{Basic Fire Shield}

Cast on a friendly unit, it does not provide any additional protection, but any enemy attacking through the fire shield will suffer damage equal to a portion of what it inflicts.

none.description:
{Protection from Air}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Air spells.

basic.description:
{Basic Protection from Air}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Air spells.

none.description:
{Protection from Fire}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Fire spells.

basic.description:
{Basic Protection from Fire}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Fire spells.

none.description:
{Protection from Water}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Water spells.

basic.description:
{Basic Protection from Water}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Water spells.

none.description:
{Protection from Earth}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Earth spells.

basic.description:
{Basic Protection from Earth}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Earth spells.

none.description:
{Anti-magic}

Protects the selected unit from all low level spells.

basic.description:
{Basic Anti-magic}

Protects the selected unit from all low level spells.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Anti-magic}

Protects the selected unit all but the most powerful spells.

expert.description:
{Expert Anti-magic}

Protects the selected unit from all spells.

none.description:
{Magic Mirror}

Reflects hostile spells towards a random enemy creature 20% of the time.

basic.description:
{Basic Magic Mirror}

Reflects hostile spells towards a random enemy creature 20% of the time.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Magic Mirror}

Reflects hostile spells towards a random enemy creature 30% of the time.

expert.description:
{Expert Magic Mirror}

Reflects hostile spells towards a random enemy creature 40% of the time.

none.description:
{Bless}

Causes the selected unit to inflict maximum damage in combat.

basic.description:
{Basic Bless}

Causes the selected unit to inflict maximum damage in combat.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Bless}

Causes the selected unit to inflict greater than their normal maximum damage in combat.

expert.description:
{Expert Bless}

Causes all friendly units to inflict greater than their normal maximum damage in combat.

none.description:
{Curse}

Causes the selected enemy unit to inflict minimum damage in combat.

basic.description:
{Basic Curse}

Causes the selected enemy unit to inflict minimum damage in combat.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Curse}

Causes the selected enemy unit to inflict less than their normal minimum damage in combat.

expert.description:
{Expert Curse}

Causes all enemy units to inflict less than their normal minimum damage in combat.

none.description:
{Bloodlust}

Increases the hand-to-hand damage inflicted by the selected unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Bloodlust}

Increases the hand-to-hand damage inflicted by the selected unit.

none.description:
{Precision}

Increases the ranged attack damage inflicted by the selected unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Precision}

Increases the ranged attack damage inflicted by the selected unit.

none.description:
{Weakness}

Reduces the selected enemy unit's attack strength.

basic.description:
{Basic Weakness}

Reduces the selected enemy unit's attack strength.

none.description:
{Stone Skin}

Increases the selected unit's defense strength.

basic.description:
{Basic Stone Skin}

Increases the selected unit's defense strength.

none.description:
{Disrupting Ray}

Reduces the selected enemy unit's defense strength.  A single enemy may be targeted multiple times by this spell.

basic.description:
{Basic Disrupting Ray}

Reduces the selected enemy unit's defense strength.  A single enemy may be targeted multiple times by this spell.

none.description:
{Prayer}

Bestows a bonus to the attack strength, defense strength and speed of the selected unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Prayer}

Bestows a bonus to the attack strength, defense strength and speed of the selected unit.

none.description:
{Mirth}

Increases the selected unit's morale.

basic.description:
{Basic Mirth}

Increases the selected unit's morale.

none.description:
{Sorrow}

Reduces the morale of the selected enemy unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Sorrow}

Reduces the morale of the selected enemy unit.

none.description:
{Fortune}

Increases the selected unit's luck.

{Misfortune}

Reduces the luck of the selected enemy unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Haste}

Increases the speed of the selected unit.

none.description:
{Haste}

Increases the speed of the selected unit.

{Slow}

Reduces the speed of the selected enemy unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Slow}

Reduces the speed of the selected enemy unit.

none.description:
{Slayer}

Increases the amount of damage inflicted by a unit when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths and Hydras.

basic.description:
{Basic Slayer}

Increases the amount of damage inflicted by a unit when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths and Hydras.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Slayer}

Increases the amount of damage inflicted by a unit when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths, Hydras, Devils and Angels.

expert.description:
{Expert Slayer}

Increases the amount of damage inflicted by a unit when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths, Hydras, Devils, Angels and Titans.

none.description:
{Frenzy}

Selected troop intentionally lowers its defenses to increase the ferocity of its attack.

basic.description:
{Basic Frenzy}

Selected troop intentionally lowers its defenses to increase the ferocity of its attack.

none.description:
{Counterstrike}

The selected unit will retaliate against one additional attack each round.

basic.description:
{Basic Counterstrike}

The selected unit will retaliate against one additional attack each round.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Counterstrike}

The selected unit will retaliate against two additional attacks each round.

expert.description:
{Expert Counterstrike}

All friendly units will retaliate against two additional attacks each round.

none.description:
{Berserk}

The targeted unit will randomly attack the nearest unit, be it friend or foe.

basic.description:
{Basic Berserk}

The targeted unit will randomly attack the nearest unit, be it friend or foe.

none.description:
{Hypnotize}

Puts an enemy unit temporarily under your control.

basic.description:
{Basic Hypnotize}

Puts an enemy unit temporarily under your control.

none.description:
{Forgetfulness}

Half of the selected enemy unit forgets to use its ranged attack.

basic.description:
{Basic Forgetfulness}

Half of the selected enemy unit forgets to use its ranged attack.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Forgetfulness}

Causes the selected enemy unit to forget to use its ranged attack in combat.

expert.description:
{Expert Forgetfulness}

Causes all enemy troops to forget to use their ranged attack in combat.

basic.description:
{Basic Blind}

Blinds a creature so that it cannot move and causes it to counterattack at half its normal attack strength.  Blindness persists until the unit is attacked or dispelled.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Blind}

Blinds a creature so that it cannot move and causes it to counterattack at one-quarter of its normal attack strength.  Blindness persists until the unit is attacked or dispelled.

expert.description:
{Expert Blind}

Blinds a creature so that it cannot move or counterattack.  Blindness persists until the unit is attacked or dispelled.

none.description:
{Blind}

Blinds a creature so that it cannot move and causes it to counterattack at half its normal attack strength.  Blindness persists until the unit is attacked or dispelled.
